attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All front line voluntry organisations and emergency services must all include some type of body protection the Police have it but ambulance crews dont nore do firefighters, and neither do voluntary organisations. Body protection like as a good example Stab Proof Vests to protect themselves against any unforseen attacks at them.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
